basic.blooming: Succulent plants, can open dark red flowers in late summer
basic.color: Succulent stem red brown with adequate sunlight

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like light, avoid strong direct sunlight in summer
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry, reduce water in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
